About me

My name is Jay,

I’m a Front-End Developer and skilled SEO-specialist. I have a serious passion for UI effects, animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences.

Well-organised person, problem solver, independent employee with high attention to details. Fan of Cincinnati Bengals, Astronomy and British TV Series.

Interested in the entire frontend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.

Let’s make something special together!

Front-End
Create fast, responsive websites which are easy to use and built with best practices. I also have a little full-stack developer experience with popular CMS, such as Wordpress and OpenCart.
SEO
Professional audit and improve your site in order to increase the number of visitors it receives.
